lead_paragraph: Under a measure approved by lawmakers in Albany, judicial raises would take effect unless blocked by legislation.
snippet: Under a measure approved by lawmakers in Albany, judicial raises would take effect unless blocked by legislation.

headline.main: Judges May Get First Raises in Years After Legislature Backs Panel to Set Their Pay
headline.seo: N.Y. Judges’ Pay Raises May Soon Bypass Legislature
headline.print_headline: Judges May Get First Raises in Years After Legislature Backs Panel to Set Their Pay
